tns:patch.author: Alexandru Artimon
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_donor_type AS SELECT vd.amp_activity_id, orgtype.org_type, orgtype.amp_org_type_id AS org_type_id FROM v_donors vd JOIN amp_organisation org ON org.amp_org_id = vd.amp_donor_org_id JOIN amp_org_group orggroup ON orggroup.amp_org_grp_id = org.org_grp_id JOIN amp_org_type orgtype ON orgtype.amp_org_type_id = orggroup.org_type;
